name: Take As Needed (itch)
description:
Welcome to Mazer- the most cutting-edge pharmaceutical company in the world! As a drug developer, you'll be designing compounds used for all sorts of things. It's a highly treasured position, so be punctual, treat your coworkers with respect, and make sure your customer leave satisfied.

Don't forgot to take care of yourself too- the last thing Mazer needs is another liability! Manage your stress, reputation, and panic attack disorder through whatever means necessary... Hey, don't you work for a pharmaceutical company? Let's just make a drug to take the edge off!

========================================================

Take As Needed was made possible through funding provided by the Loyola Marymount University Honors Program, and is a part of a research project that investigated methods of addressing mental health in video games. Through it, we hope to provide a stark and critical look into modern day pharmaceutical culture.

All proceeds will be donated to insulin access and medical research charities.
